def find(string):
	result=0
	temp=0
	length=len(string)
	for j in small:
		temp+=string.count(j)
		result+=int((string.count(j)/2.0)+.6)
		if temp==length:
			return result
	return result
t=int(input())
small=[]
for i in range(97,123):
	small+=[chr(i)]
for i in range(65,91):
	small+=[chr(i)]
for i in range(t):
	string=raw_input()
	print find(string)
